mapper.select: select b.store_code storeCode, b.store_name storeName, c.dic_name provinceName, d.dic_name cityName, e.dic_name areaName, CONCAT_WS('-',c.dic_name,d.dic_name,e.dic_name,b.address) address, b.invite_code inviteCode, a.role role from t_sys_user a LEFT JOIN t_store b on a.user_code = b.user_code LEFT JOIN t_dictionary c on b.province_code = c.dic_code LEFT JOIN t_dictionary d on b.city_code = d.dic_code LEFT JOIN t_dictionary e on b.area_code = e.dic_code where a.user_code = #{userId}

select a.user_code userCode, a.user_name userName, a.phone phone from t_sys_user a LEFT JOIN t_driver b on a.user_code = b.user_code where b.is_deleted = 0 and b.area_code in (select area_code from t_store where user_code = #{userId})
